auth.Bot check failed. This may be due to net: Bot chek faild. Xis mei bi diu tu netwrk ishuz or sekiuriti restrikshns. Pliiz rilod xe paij.
auth.Didn’t receive the code? Check your spam: Didnt risiiv xe kod? Chek ior spam foldr, waitlist support@angularmomentum.app, or trai login in if iu alredi hav an akownt.
auth.I confirm that I am 16 years of age or o: Ai konferm xat ai am 16 iirz ov aij or oldr
auth.If an account with that information exis: If an akownt wix xat informaishn egzists, a paswerd riset imail haz bin sent tu xe akownt’s imail adres.
auth.Register or log in to access all feature: Rejistr or log in tu akses al fiichrs
auth.The username you selected was unavailabl: Xe iuzerneim iu selektd waz uneivailabl. Iu kan set a niu wun in ior iuzr profail
auth.This device has saved data from before y: Xis divais haz saivd daita fram bifor iu logd in. Wud iu laik tu import it? (egzisting daita wont bi ovritn)
auth.We’ve sent a 6-digit verification code t: Wiiv sent a 6-dijit verifikaishn kod tu:

error.For security purposes, you can only requ: For sekiuriti perposes, iu kan onli rikwest xis aafte anuxr {seconds} sekonds.
error.Invalid or expired code. Please try agai: Invailid or ekspaird kod. Pliiz trai agein.
error.Please verify your email address before: Pliiz verifai ior imail adres bifor sainin in.
error.Your verification code has expired or is: Ior verifikaishn kod haz ekspaird or iz invailid. Pliiz rikwest a niu wun.

menu.If it doesn’t update momentarily, please: If it duznt updait momntarili, pliiz trai tu kliir ior kash and refrsh ior browzr.
menu.If you encounter problems, use the web v: If iu enkawntr problmz, iuz xe web vrshn at
until an ap updait iz redi.

Xis ap iz {semver} awt ov dait.

migration.Download a backup of your data from befo: Downlod a bakup ov ior daita fram bifor xe last updait.
migration.The previous data is available to downlo: Xe priivius daita iz eivailabl tu eksport fram ior profail paij.
migration.Your data has been updated to a new form: Ior daita haz bin updaitd tu a niu format.

notification.Check out the latest updates in the Feat: Chek awt xe laitest updaits in xe Fiichrs sekshn!
notification.Scheduled maintenance will occur tonight: Sheduld maintinns wil okur tunait at {time}.
notification.Thanks for trying Angular Momentum—your: Xanks for traiin Angular Momntm—ior modrn Angular startr kit!
notification.You successfully tested the notification: Iu suksesfuli testd xe notifikaishn sistm!

page.Enter some text to have it persist betwe: Entr sam tekst tu hav it persist bitwiin paij rilodz (saivd in browzr storij)
page.If you find this project helpful and wan: If iu faind xis projekt helpfl and want tu sii it gro, konsidr suportin its devlopmnt. Evri kontribiushn (wexr xru fiidback, pul rikwests, or donaishns) helps us kiip impruuvin.
page.Install Angular Momentum on your device: Instol Angular Momntm on ior divais insted ov iuzin it via a web browzr:
page.Send predefined notifications to test th: Send pridifaind notifikashns tu test xe sistm
page.Sends a notification only to your curren: Sends a notifikaishn onli tu ior kurent browzr/divais. Iuzs xe NotifikaishnSrvis direktli.
page.Sends a notification via GraphQL to the: Sends a notifikaishn via GrafQL tu xe servr, wich brodkasts it tu AL konektd klaints via WebSoket.
Tauri aps iuz naitiv OS notifikashns. Web/PWA iuzs browzr notifikashns via Srvis Werkr.
page.This project is designed to rapidly spin: Xis projekt iz dizaind tu rapidli spin up Angular aplikashns wixin a monoripo wix miniml konfiguraishn. It kumz pri-konfigurd wix iusfl laibrariiz tu asist wix; translaishn (i18n, l10n), GrafQL and tradishnl REST API, websokts, oflain storij wix IndeksdDB, srvis werkrs, griin test suuts (iunit and e2e) and much mor tu help iu fokus on bildin ior ap insted ov waistin taim on xe setup.
page.Turn features on and off for feature fla: Trn fiichrs on and of for fiichr flag testin
page.Unable to load API documentation. Please: Unaibl tu lod API dokiumentaishn. Pliiz chek ior konekshn and trai agein.

privacy.We collect minimal personal information: Wi kolekt miniml personl informaishn (imail, iuzerneim, paswerd) tu provaid axentikaishn srvisz. Wi du nat sel ior daita. Iu hav xe rait tu akses, korekt, and diliit ior daita at eni taim xru ior profail setins.
privacy.This privacy notice for {companyName} de: Xis praivasi notis for {companyName} diskraibs haw and wai wi mait kolekt, stor, iuz, and/or shair ior informaishn wen iu iuz awr srvisz.
privacy.We use cookies for analytics (Google Ana: Wi iuz kukiiz for analitiks (Guugl Analitiks, Hotjar) tu impruuv ior ekspiiriens. Iu kan chainj ior prefrens at eni taim.
privacy.We use cookies to improve your experienc: Wi iuz kukiiz tu impruuv ior ekspiiriens and analais sait iusij.
privacy.We use the following third-party service: Wi iuz xe foloin xrd-parti srvisz. Pliiz reviu xeir praivasi polisiiz:

profile.A verification code will be sent to your: A verifikaishn koud wil bi sent tu ior niu imail adres. Iu must entr xe koud tu kompliit xe chainj.
profile.Are you sure you want to delete your acc: Ar iu shur iu want tu diliit ior akownt? Xis akshn kanat bi undun. Al ior daita wil bi permnnentli diliitd.
profile.Download all your account data in JSON f: Downlod al ior akownt daita in JSON format
profile.Permanently delete your account and all: Permnnentli diliit ior akownt and al asosiiaitd daita. Xis akshn kanat bi undun.
profile.Please enter a valid email address: Pliiz entr a vailid imail adres
profile.Remove all stored preferences, notificat: Rimuuv al stord prefrenses, notifikashns, and setins. Ior akownt wil rimain aktiv.
profile.Verification email sent! Please check yo: Verifikaishn imail sent! Pliiz chek ior niu imail adres and entr xe konfermaishn koud.
profile.Without a username, your profile is priv: Wixawt a iuzerneim, ior profail iz praivt
